contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Feel free if you've any question

card-1.title: Fuchsia (Full time) Mar 2023 - Present
card-1.description: The GISX project is the company's core group insurance system project. This project is currently in production. In which I have a role in doing the frontend of the house. The project has a value of more than 500 million baht and I have been a part of its development. The project was created to solve problems and change the lagacy system to the new system. I was involved in setting up the foundation structure of the system by using Next js along with Module Federation to create a Micro Frontend system from doing R&D until the structure was connected between Server and Client. And I have been involved in leading the team to make the major features of the system, also being a consultant for the business sector, limiting or Trade off the system, giving suggestions to the business department and provide advice on systematic work, including reviewing code implementation every round in the weekly Sync meeting.

card-2.title: Shippop (Outsource) Jan 2022 - Feb 2023
card-2.description: Shippop Global is a product courier aggregator around the world to make transport parcels easier. I have role in Frontend developer. we work as Scrum, gathering requirement from PO, development in Next Js and build API Gateway via Nextjs, using version control of Azure DevOps and building CI/CD that contain Automate testing by Cypress and setting Infrastacture.

card-3.title: Shippop (Cooperation Education) Aug 2021 - Nov 2021
card-3.description: All Express project is a product that drive by Multi level marketing business. this product was built for solving delivering a parcel. This product is as POS (Platform as a service). You can be like a store page without store front. I'm involve with team and product owner to build our vision of post office on webpage.

expertise.title: Software Development
expertise.description: In order to achieve the veriest result of product, a must be choosing the tool which appropriate the product. also choosing suited algorithm and the best practice to approach our goal. for my best solution for choosing tooling is using SSR to develop the product that base on security and hight performance.
expertise.quotation: Use the right tool with the right job.

conclusion.title: That's not all of my experience
